content: Get Reserved Tokyo Skytree Tickets to guarantee entry even at the busiest times
Choose a Combo Ticket to grab 350m and 450m deck passes at once: less queuing, more viewing!
Enjoy great savings compared to same-day Tokyo Skytree tickets!
Skip the lines on the day — sometimes hours long — with an e-voucher to exchange near the entrance
Take in stunning 360° views of Tokyo and Mt. Fuji from Japan's tallest tower
